text:
I am getting a weird error trying to run sciml_train with the following code: `res = DiffEqFlux.sciml_train(loss, p, ADAM(0.1), cb = callback, maxiters = 100)`
This code is from an example in the documentation so I am pretty sure it should work normally and all of my packages are updated. Stack trace in thread. Anyone have this problem before?

elements.text: I am getting a weird error trying to run sciml_train with the following code:
res = DiffEqFlux.sciml_train(loss, p, ADAM(0.1), cb = callback, maxiters = 100)
This code is from an example in the documentation so I am pretty sure it should work normally and all of my packages are updated. Stack trace in thread. Anyone have this problem before?
